name: Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force DLC Bundle
name_original: Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force DLC Bundle
description:
Get the game + all the goods of the DLC Pack with this DLC Bundle!

Includes the following item and fairy sets:
  • Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force game
  • Veteran Fencer Armor & Accessory Sets
  • Ultimate Fencer Armor & Accessory Sets
  • Fairy Set 1: Ahab & Leela
  • Fairy Set 2: Aques & Drulger
  • Fairy Set 3: Lars & Foxer
